EmailTemplate.subject: Learn more about Dental Implants
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
I’d like to thank you for calling ClearChoice to inquire about dental implants and beautiful new teeth ... in just one day.*
You may be skeptical that dental implants and functional new teeth can be done in one day. As a leader in implant dentistry we have successfully completed over 10,000 cases and we urge you to watch our informative video (http://www.ClearChoice.com/movie) which answers many questions you may have.
We hope that, like many others, you choose to:
Schedule a free consultation. In a friendly environment, you’ll be able to:
Tour our state-of-the-art facility and receive a FREE panoramic X-ray
Meet with the doctor to discuss your dental concerns
See for yourself how dental implants and beautiful new teeth can be done conveniently in a day
Determine the fee for your specific treatment plan
Understand your financing options
Our mission statement is to give our patients a high standard of care and a high quality experience. ClearChoice brings together state of the art technology, surgical procedures and restorative techniques that can enhance your appearance and lifestyle.
Dental implants are a superior solution for your dental problems! We are available Monday through Friday at 1-888-654-4675 between the hours of 8:00am-5:00pm to answer your questions.
Sincerely,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Dental Implant Consultant P.S. Remember to check out our website at clearchoice.com
